Instance.description: The instance tuning for subroot definitions, which can be shared between parts.

TunableList.name: bone_names
TunableList.description: The list of bone names that make up this subroot. Use this to specify containment slots for the given part. If the part specifies a subroot, the bone name will be automatically postfixed with the subroot index. For example, for part subroot 1: _ctnm_eat_ -> _ctnm_eat_1
